title: The Right Honorable Gordon Brown - USC Schaeffer

quotes: In 2020, he played a key role leading a group of 275 former world leaders, economists and educationalists calling for international action to prevent the global health crisis from creating a “COVID generation” of tens of millions of children without a chance of an education.
founded first in his home county, Fife, in 2021 as a campaign to alleviate household material poverty by rescuing and redistributing surplus home, hygiene and clothing products to families.
He was appointed a Member of the Order of the Companions of Honour in the 2024 King’s Birthday Honours List.

organizations.name: International Commission on Financing Global Education Opportunity
quotes: and was Chair of the International Commission on Financing Global Education Opportunity that led to the creation of the International Financing Facility for Education (IFFEd).

organizations.name: International Financing Facility for Education (IFFEd)
quotes: that led to the creation of the International Financing Facility for Education (IFFEd).

organizations.name: University of Edinburgh
quotes: Dr Brown has a PhD in History from the University of Edinburgh and spent his early career working as a lecturer and in television production.
He has been awarded several honorary doctorates including the Universities of Edinburgh, Glasgow, Abertay and The Open University as well as a number of international doctorates.

organizations.name: University of Glasgow
quotes: He has been awarded several honorary doctorates including the Universities of Edinburgh, Glasgow, Abertay and The Open University as well as a number of international doctorates.

organizations.name: Abertay University
quotes: He has been awarded several honorary doctorates including the Universities of Edinburgh, Glasgow, Abertay and The Open University as well as a number of international doctorates.

organizations.name: The Open University
quotes: He has been awarded several honorary doctorates including the Universities of Edinburgh, Glasgow, Abertay and The Open University as well as a number of international doctorates.

organizations.name: WHO
quotes: In his role as WHO Ambassador, Dr Brown has been invited by WHO Director-General Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus to raise awareness internationally on the need for sustained global health financing, particularly from G20 and G7 countries, to finance the vaccination of the whole world and protect the poorest countries from COVID-19 and other diseases.

organizations.name: Graça Machel Trust
quotes: In addition to his global education work, Dr Brown is an advisor to the Graça Machel Trust, a Senior Panel Member at the Kofi Annan Foundation initiative on Electoral Integrity, and he is also an Honorary Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh.

organizations.name: Kofi Annan Foundation
quotes: a Senior Panel Member at the Kofi Annan Foundation initiative on Electoral Integrity

organizations.name: Royal Society of Edinburgh
quotes: he is also an Honorary Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh.

organizations.name: The National Family Centre
quotes: Within the United Kingdom, Dr Brown is President of The National Family Centre, the umbrella charity of the Multibank movement, founded first in his home county, Fife, in 2021 as a campaign to alleviate household material poverty by rescuing and redistributing surplus home, hygiene and clothing products to families.

organizations.name: Our Scottish Future
quotes: Dr Brown is also the founder of Our Scottish Future, a non-profit research and campaign organisation focused on building a stronger Scotland in a better Britain.

organizations.name: Theirworld
quotes: He is married to Sarah Brown, who chairs the global children’s charity Theirworld and is Executive Chair of
